name: Dreaming Life
description:
I created this game for the Godot Game Jam #40 jam.

I worked on this for 8 days, between my studying sessions. 

It's supposed to be a relaxing game, mixed with a bit of completionism, since the objective of this game is to collect every item that you can buy during your daily routine. You can work to gain money but you will lose energy, that you can restore by either eating or resting in the bed. I hope you will have fun!
